name: Hot Doggo: Barks & Burgers
description:
Cold Cat Robot took over the park where you have your burger stand, you must stop him!

Prepare the food in the menu and throw it at him in the fastest time possible. The food can either be burgers, fries, or soft drinks. Becareful though, the robot has tricks up his sleeve and will try to hinder your cooking with attacks of his own!

Have fun and enjoy the game!
